programme.desc: The Panchurian Candidate - After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Rupert & The Hilarious Hiccups - Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda are playing in the forest when Freddy and Freda spot a colourful box dropped by a travelling salesman. They open it expecting to find sandwiches or even a cake but get more than they expected when hiccups jump out of the box instead. They try to run away from the hiccups but crash into the travelling salesman and his colourful cart and upset a box of yawns and a box of giggling noises too. Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda discover that the noises are very infectious and come up with a plan to help the travelling salesman capture the naughty noises again. Greedy Freddy and Freda still haven't learnt their lesson. They find the remainder of the Elf's lunch and guzzle it all up only to catch the hiccups for real and learn that they need to be less greedy in future.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Rupert And The Snowglobe - When Rupert, Bill and Ping-Pong arrive at the beach one sunny day they are amazed to find a small snowstorm raging over one distinct area. Jack Frost emerges and explains that he has come early this year because he wants to catch some sun. He shows them the snowglobe he uses to control the icy storm. The friends play in the snow unaware that Ming has got hold of the snowglobe and is shaking it up, causing the storm to grow out of control....

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky'S Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep79
programme.desc: Fifi'S Filmshow - Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep80
programme.desc: Pip And The Genie - Fifi has too much to do as usual. Stingo offers to help with some of her jobs in exchange for a pie. He then tricks Pip into believing that he has a magic lamp, and will give it to Pip if he does Fifi's jobs for him

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep3
programme.desc: Bully For You / The Ra Animator - Bully For You When Casper decides he can't take any more of Thatch's nastiness, he forms a secret squad dedicated to putting an end to bullying. The Ra-minator Using the power of invisibility, Casper offers to help transform Ra from a sports zero to an athletic hero.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep66
programme.desc: Launch Date - The Paladins take the day off to spend with their friends and family before launching off to space again. Lance works up the courage to ask Allura out on a date.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep14
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter One - When Rocky and Bullwinkle damage the largest birdbath in the world, they set out on a musical adventure to put on a benefit concert and raise the money needed to restore the birdbath.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep23
programme.desc: The Royal Strutters / Impromptu Cruise - After pulling a sword from a tree, Sage is crowned king for the day. Archibald wins a fancy vacation aboard a luxury cruise.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch A Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep24
programme.desc: Disaster Of Puppets/Love Will Eep Us Together - Thunk invents ventriloquism when he tries (and fails) at stand-up comedy, but he gets jealous when Ahhh! Valley thinks the puppet is the real comedian/Eep is determined for two buffalippos to find love when Grug denies her dating privileges.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep48
programme.desc: The Secret Life Of Oh / Beings Bad - Tip finds out what Oh does all day while she's at school/Oh tries to change his good reputation by acting out

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep23
programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep19
programme.desc: Why Hare Hops - You see there was a time when Hare didn't hop. He was one of the speediest animals in Tinga Tinga but none of the other animals wanted to race with him because Hare always won and it was becoming boring. Then one day, slow but clever Tortoise decides to challenge Hare. Hare can't believe his luck, but Tortoise wins and he wins and he wins! When Hare realizes that it's not such fun being on the losing end, Tortoise finally lets Hare hop past the finishing line in first place! Well it's not good to win all the time. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be… and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. ‘Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - ‘The sun is never going to rise again!' – soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic – ‘The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep19
programme.desc: The Case Of Bling'S Hidden Present - It's Bling's birthday and she is so excited that she keeps opening all her presents before her party. Noddy needs to make sure she doesn't open the storybook present from him and Big Ears early – but he's got to find it first! Big Ears has hidden it and can't remember where he's put it! Noddy launches his investigation to find the missing present before Bling does. Using his investigating skills Noddy follows the clues all over Toyland to find the present before the impatient little Naughticorn. At her birthday party Bling is thrilled to open the present from Noddy and Big Ears. She does have a present to open at her party after all! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep20
programme.desc: The Case Of The Big Wall Of Bricks - Fuse has a new electronic ball. Noddy suggests that they invite everyone to play with it later. Fuse agrees but when Noddy returns with the other toys there is a big brick wall in front of the workshop. No one can get in and there's no sign of Fuse! Noddy uses all his investigating skills to follow the clues. He discovers that Fuse built the brick wall to stop his friends coming into the workshop because he was worried his new electronic ball might get broken. Noddy helps him feel comfortable with sharing his toy ball after all the other toys promise to be super careful with it. Now everyone can play together! Yay for Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep19
programme.desc: Where'S My Feather Gone? - Jess thinks that Little Bird has dropped a feather as a gift for him to keep and play with so he's very worried when it goes missing. He searches for it and finally he finds it, right in Little Bird's nest, keeping her warm.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep20
programme.desc: Where Have All The Stars Gone? - Jess is having a sleepover and wants to wish on a star with the puppies like Willow has told them to. But they all fall asleep. When he wakes in the morning to find the stars are gone he has to work out why and when they'll be back

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep23
programme.desc: Chet Vs Dr. Disorder / Damselfly In Distress - Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep9
programme.desc: The Strength Of Scotland - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard head to Scotland, where Odlulu is using the Strength Key to give her an advantage in the Highland Games. Wenda competes in the games alongside other Wanderers while Wally and Whitebeard try to get the key from an elusive Fritz!

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Richie Rich And The Tapir Of Doom / Dollar Dollar Saves Y'All - Tiny and Lucretia sign on as sidekicks in Richie's search for a legendary treasure. Dollar's desperate to prove he's the Best Good Boy.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.desc: Rekindling Retreat / Trashbassador - Tip and Oh accidentally go to a Couples' Retreat/Tip and Oh help Traffic Cone Larry run against Smek for a local government position

programme.desc: Rupert And The Dancing Shoes - Raggety wants new shoes but can't afford them so Ping Pong tries to jazz up the ones he's wearing but her spell goes wrong and the shoes dance off with Raggety inside them and unable to stop. Will Rupert and Ping Pong be able to stop Raggety in time before the shoes carry him one step too far, into danger?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Rupert And The Oldest Tree - Rupert is on a hunt for leaves to fill his new wall chart. He meets Raggety who offers to help him find a strange star-shaped leaf from a magical tree – the oldest tree in Nutwood. The Fox Twins don't think much of leaf hunting. They overhear Rupert's plans and decide to play a trick on Rupert and Raggety. But their trick backfires when Raggety does some elf magic and Freddie vanishes into thin air. How will Rupert and Raggety find Freddie and get him back to Freda? And what of their search for the oldest tree in the forest?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep29
programme.desc: Hide And Toot - The animals are playing hide and seek. Huffty gets upset when his trunk keeps giving him away. Can Raa Raa and his friends show the little elephant that his trunk is really rather wonderful?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep81
programme.desc: Runaway Mo - Stingo is bored, he wants something exciting to do. He decides to take Mo for a spin without asking Fifi first. All goes wrong when Mo gets out of control. Can the tots stop the runaway mower?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep82
programme.desc: Stingo'S Enormous Carrot - Pip is trying hard to grow some vegetables. But however hard he tries, they don't seem to get any bigger. But Stingo's vegetable patch next door appears to be doing suspiciously well.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins / Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Someone has been swiping fish off Cap’n Turbot’s boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. // Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it’s up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepover - Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Big Face in Space - The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice - Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington And The Meteor Shower - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Construction Contest - To compete in the Axle City Construction Contest, Blaze and his friends turn into construction vehicles! But when Crusher sends them far away, it'll take all of their construction skills combined to make it back before time runs out.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Quest for the Crown - Chase and the team are called to Barkingburg to keep an eye on the crown.

It's up to Ryder and the Paw Patrol to get them under control!

programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Big Face in Space - The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil - Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Great Pizza Race - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep426
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save Puplantis - Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Sunken Sloop / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Wiggly Whale - Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down. // It's stuck in the sand at the bottom of the ocean, with Cap'n Turbot and Francois inside!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep509
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pirated Sea Patroller - The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep712
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Pupmobiles - Mayor Goodway honors the Paw Patrol with the Key to the City. But Sid Swashbuckle and his trusty pirate pup Arrby swipe the key. Ryder calls for an Ultimate Rescue as the pups team up, Police style, to solve the mystery and stop those pesky pirates.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep163
programme.desc: Switcheroo - When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep164
programme.desc: The Missing Socks - When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg / Pups Save Bedtime - Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks. // The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat Family / Pups Save a Mud Monster - A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave, so the Pups have to free them! The bats search for a new home leads to problems in town though! // Snowboarders on Jake's Mountain are stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is on the loose!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington and The Meteor Shower / Paddington and The Talent Show - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil / Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge - Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep522
programme.desc: A Load of Litterbugs! - On the U.S.S. Recycler, Captain Deema and her crew strive to leave every planet cleaner than they found it. But their mission is put to the test when a crew of messy Litterbugs, led by the evil Garbage Khan, take over their ship!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Blue's Surprise Box - It's LOVE DAY! Josh and Blue LOVE Love Day, and Blue is making YOU something very special. While we play Blue's Clues to figure out what she's making, we help Slippery finish his Love Day Cards and help cheer up our sad Heart Friends.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Snow Rescue Blaze - When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Treasure of El Bravo - After Enrique steals the heart of El Bravo, there's only one person who can help Santi and crew save the day: Tomás's younger sister, Prima Tina!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Pups Save the Space Alien / Pups Save a Flying Frog - An Alien Spaceship crash lands at Farmer Yumi’s! The PAW Patrol will help out the stranded little extra-terrestrial to get back to his home planet! // Marshall’s new pet frog, Smiley, is going to be in a jumping contest!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep117
programme.desc: A Very Busy Afternoon - Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep108
programme.desc: Bunny Rabbits - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po watch bunny rabbits. Bunny ears and tails appear on the Teletubbies. They do the 'bunny hop hop' before saying 'eh oh' to the Tiddlytubbies.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep13
programme.desc: Hedgehog - Dee encourages a friend to say `hedgehog', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today we meet lots of hedgehogs: a brown hedgehog, a small hedgehog, a snuffling hedgehog and a hungry hedgehog.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep68
programme.desc: Ramping Up - Uni-Boarder Jo has outgrown Tinpotown's Skate Park... but she doesn't want to stop the less experienced Kid Po from getting their practice!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep13
programme.desc: It's Time For a Boat Ride - JoJo and Gran Gran bump into Ned and Monty as they walk along the canal. Ned invites them onboard to go on a boat ride, where JoJo gets to act as captain - on the lookout for treasure!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Coconut Safari Club - Monty is surprised when his family tell him that Jimmy Jones can't appreciate music because he's an animal.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: Happy Ordinary Day - Monty is in the mood for celebrating and begins to wonder if you really can only celebrate big, special occasions.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: Kids - A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Cake Badge - The rabbits are very upset when Happy eats their cake, so Duggee decides to make them a new one with the help of the squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Drawing Badge - It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - While Lars, Kelly and Xuli go into the sewers to help keep London clean, Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes down the toilet.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Hollywood, USA - After winning a part in a Hollywood film, Glitch is not happy when he has to work with Kyan to finish a scene.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Mount Mumandad - Bingo and Bluey have five minutes to bed, just enough time to race to the summit of Mount Mumandad. But for them, facing powerful storms, avalanches and stinky spots will take teamwork.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Camping - While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: Andy and The Sea Lions - When some new South American sea lions arrive at the park, it's up to Andy to find out many fish they like to eat.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: Downhill Machines - Grace shows off three amazing machines that all go downhill!

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep22
programme.desc: Aweseome Ancestors - Captain Captain is surprised at how little Seaweed knows about his awesome pirating family.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep8
programme.desc: The Hat Badge - King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: Tag's First Day - The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep52
programme.desc: Sami Reindeer Herding, Norway - The Go Jetters are in snowy Norway to learn about the Sami reindeer. The reindeers are migrating and need to get a ferry to their warmer summer home.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep51
programme.desc: Ilulissat, Greenland - Grandmaster Glitch has travelled to Ilulissat in Greenland to show his teddy, Cuddles, the sights. But Cuddles ends up getting stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep7
programme.desc: The Rubbish Train - Thomas has to help Whiff take a train of rubbish to the waste dump, but wants to stay clean so that he can take the Duchess of Boxford to have tea with Lady Hatt.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep23
programme.desc: Extra Bounce - John's yellow bouncy ball is too bouncy, but Sarah thinks she knows where the solution can be found...

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep22
programme.desc: Parasol Show - Umbrella is nervous about meeting up with his pen pal at the Parasol Show, so Sarah & Duck accompany him.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: Sun Spots - Nora turns Nelly into a Sunflower.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: I Spy With My Little Eyes - More fun and games with the lovable siblings. Charlie and Marv go swimming, and Lola decides to play 'Spies' with her imaginary friend Soren Lorenson.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: The Thing That Danced - A huge dinopaw blocks the friends' way into wiggly canyon, and won't let them pass until they learn a dance.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Sleep - The friends find a fun slide to play on, only to realise that it is in fact a sleeping dinopaw!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep42
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - It's time for a family game of hide and seek. Everyone hides, while Bluey counts to twenty, but will she be able to stay focused on the game and not get distracted by all her toys.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: The Library Badge - When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water, even though it makes a mess. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.desc: Your one stop shop for a wrap-up of the week in politics with some of the sharpest minds in the parliamentary press gallery. Greg Jennett and the panel discuss the big stories that dominated the news cycle. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep240
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: The Drum Ep225
programme.desc: In this ever-changing world, turn to Ellen Fanning and a panel of informed minds for forthright and insightful conversations on the day's news, big issues, local topics and unique personal insights on the issues that matter.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep240
programme.desc: Australians turn to ABC News when news breaks at home or abroad. Lorna Dunkley presents the day's top stories, latest news and information, exclusive investigations and reports from respected journalists across the nation.

programme.title: Ticket To Qatar Ep6
programme.desc: Some Messi magic sees Argentina end the Socceroos' run at the World Cup. What next for Australian football? Plus France and England to meet in a Quarter Final as the action continues in Qatar. Tracey Holmes has the latest.

programme.title: ABC News Ep294
programme.desc: News from where you live. ABC News QLD brings you today's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter. Presented by Jessica van Vonderen.

programme.title: A Girl's Guide To Hunting, Fishing And Wild Cooking Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Conquering her fear of bees, Analiese gets her first beehive, before heading off on an adventure of foraging, fishing and diving with best friend and famous Thai restaurateur, Palisa Anderson in pristine Satellite Island.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - As PNG's women's team prepares for the Rugby League World Cup, we meet the female pioneers and players who are inspiring women and girls to participate in the country's most loved game.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep245
programme.desc: Australia's most trusted source of independent news, ABC News connects all Australians with the latest news, original reporting, reliable information and analysis to keep you informed and up-to-date. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep45
programme.desc: With cost of living pressures and interest rates rising, it's never been more important to keep an eye on your money. Rachel Pupazzoni and the team explain the economic impact for business and consumers. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: The World Ep245
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Inside Central Station Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A serious incident shuts down a major line causing chaos on the network and at Central Station Garry has his hands full with a Hollywood film shoot.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces Ep3
programme.desc: The gourmet chefs turned station cooks. In 2018 two retired chefs fulfilled their dream to cook for the hungry crew of an outback cattle station. But for staff used to plain food, there were a few changes needed to the menu.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep245
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with the best coverage of the day's top stories and the latest news. Michael Tetlow brings you a complete snapshot of what's happening in the cities, suburbs and regional communities.

programme.title: Going Places With Ernie Dingo Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Ernie takes a detour to Bowen to meet traditional owners taking on sea turtle research, before meeting up with a couple who show him the stunning Whitsunday passage.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep245
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date. Michael Tetlow presents ABC Late News from Perth, bringing you detailed coverage of the day's top stories, trusted analysis and new details on the issues and events that shaped our day.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep42
programme.desc: Bill Spedding's 'terrible nightmare'; Morrison's media blame; 'Droughts and flooding rains'.

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep13
programme.desc: The ACT is decriminalising small amounts of Heroin, Cocaine, MDMA and Methamphetamines. This follows on from similar legislation for cannabis in 2020. But how will this work? And will it make society safer or more dangerous?

programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Kabuki Kool
programme.desc: A historic fight between sumo wrestlers and the Megumi firefighting gang is dramatized in this play, which ends in a free-for-all on stage. Kabuki actor Kataoka Ainosuke is our guide.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.desc: This time, we investigate Kandagawa, or the Kanda River. James Farrer (Professor, Sophia University) tracks the river to find out how it took shape. Join us as we tell the secret story of Kandagawa.

programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Design Talks Plus
programme.desc: Today's theme: Revitalizing Old Homes-Traditional Cityscapes. Ageing, falling populations make it hard to preserve old homes. Yet experimental designs offer new value. Architect Nagasaka Jo explores.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: The Samurai of the Sea: Pirates or Protectors? Each time, Peter Barakan visits key locations, and meets experts with fascinating cultural insights.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Lunch On!
programme.desc: We visit the vocational school for new recruits of a house manufacturer. The students can endure the hard training thanks to the hearty lunches made by the head chef, who is an 86-year-old woman.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
programme.desc: Learn about easy, delicious and healthy cooking with Chef Rika! Featured recipe: Udon Noodles with Vegetables and Wasabi.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Jan Johnson has dedicated her life protecting and running the Panama Hotel built in 1910. Hear her message to the future through the last luggage left by Japanese Americans taken to internment camps.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: We focus on saba, or mackerel. Follow historic trade routes to Japan's former capital, Kyoto, and discover how canned saba is innovating Japanese food culture.

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
